handoff.one_sentence_goal: Build: CognOS landing page for AI trust
handoff.problem_statement: Need an execution-ready Lovable implementation brief with explicit scope and acceptance criteria.
objective: Deliver an MVP implementation plan with no ambiguity
Define acceptance criteria that can be validated quickly
scope_out: Backend architecture changes unless explicitly requested
functional_requirements: Use goal as primary deliverable: Build: CognOS landing page for AI trust
Incorporate context: Audience: Developers and CTOs. Verification focus: Traceability and compliance. Success definition: Ready for Lovable copy-paste.
Enforce constraints: Must have: Hero, CTA, proof snapshot. Must not have: No backend, no extra pages. Technical constraints: One page only. Deadline: Monday.
acceptance_criteria: Output can be pasted directly into Lovable
handoff.lovable_build_prompt:
Build this exactly as specified.

Goal: Build: CognOS landing page for AI trust
Context: Audience: Developers and CTOs. Verification focus: Traceability and compliance. Success definition: Ready for Lovable copy-paste.
Constraints: Must have: Hero, CTA, proof snapshot. Must not have: No backend, no extra pages. Technical constraints: One page only. Deadline: Monday.

Do NOT implement anything outside the requested MVP scope.
Return changed files and validation results.
handoff.qa_test_prompt: Validate implementation against acceptance criteria.\nReport pass/fail per criterion and list any missing requirements.

questionnaire_answers.build_goal: CognOS landing page for AI trust
